Package TicketPackage.PlanePackage

Class Schedule

java.lang.Object
TicketPackage.PlanePackage.Schedule
public class Schedule
extends java.lang.Object
This class helps control the planes in a schedule ((A completely static class))
Author:
Melissa Melaugh Created on: 29/11/2020 Updated on: 08/12/2020 AirportCheckIn:TicketPackage.PlanePackage:Schedule

    • getSchedule

      public static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<Plane>> getSchedule()
      This method returns the schedule so that it can be used or saved.
      Returns:
      the Hashtable> schedule

    • setSchedule

      public static void setSchedule​(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<Plane>> loadedSchedule)
      This method is responsible for setting the schedule after it has been loaded in
      Parameters:
      loadedSchedule - The loaded Hashtable> schedule.

    • generateMonth

      private static void generateMonth​(int month, int year, java.lang.String key)
      This method is meant to generate all of the planes for a given month integer
      Parameters:
      month - an int from 0-11 representing the corresponding month -1 (0-January, 1-February, etc)
      year - an int representing the current year
      key - the key for the hashtable entry

    • updateSchedule

      public static void updateSchedule()
      This method is used to update the schedule

    • addMonth

      private static void addMonth​(int month, int year, java.lang.String key)
      This method is to add a month to the schedule
      Parameters:
      month - an int from 0-11 representing the corresponding month -1 (0-January, 1-February, etc)
      year - an int representing the current year
      key - the key for the hashtable entry

    • removeMonth

      private static void removeMonth​(java.lang.String key)
      Removes a month from the Hashtable
      Parameters:
      key - the month to remove

    • getPlane

      public static Plane getPlane​(int day, int month, int year)
      This method gets the plane if you know the day, month, and year its scheduled in
      Parameters:
      day - the day that the plane is scheduled to take off
      month - the month that the plane is scheduled to take off
      year - the year that the month is scheduled to take off
      Returns:
      the plane that is linked to that day/month/year

    • getPlane

      public static Plane getPlane​(int day, int monthChoice)
      This method gets the plane relative to the current schedule
      Parameters:
      day - the day of the month you want to get the plane of
      monthChoice - either this month (1) or next month (2)
      Returns:
      the plane at the give month/day key
